name: Defshot
description:
Defshot is a little action game where you need to kill a bunch of enemies to pass level. Game is in development and there are only 7 achievements, 7 enemies & 30 lvls.
This is my first game so do not judge strictly. (Seriously, I'm only 14 years old!) I know that this game can be weird sometimes.

There is also customization screen. Make your character unique!

Controls:
  • A & D - Move
  • W - Jump (hold to jump higher)
  • S - Stomp (press in jump) (Stomp 'em all. :D)
  • Shift+A/D - Dash
  • LMB - shoot (hold it down)
  • RMB - throw a grenade. (It bounces. A lot.)
  • You also can wall jump and double jump.
Credits ( all is CC0 ): 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/) - base for characters and all hair/hats are made by him. juhani.junkala@musician.org - all music in this game was made by him.

If anyone liked this game, I can continue to develop it. I also want to make multiplayer mode. That should be fun.

I think that’s all. Thanks for viewing! ( and sorry for bad english :p )

Was made by me in 6 days for newbie jam.
